Software Engineer Onboarding Track

Now, let's take a one week learning to ramp up.

Topic Summary
Day 1. Azure Management Try different tools to managed Azure resources.
Day 2. Azure Core Services Learn and try some core services on Azure.
Day 3. Important Azure Concepts Understand more about Azure.
Day 4. Service Developing Eco-System Know about Azure service developing and maintenance.
Day 5. Data Driven Engineering Understand data-driven and keep it in mind.
Day 6. Engineer Tech Ramp Get yourself prepared for the language knowledge.
Day 7. Prepare for You Own Team Understand the business and tech area of your team.
